doc:
Fred Stoller https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fred_Stoller 0 Frederick "Fred" Stoller (born March 19, 1958) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, author, writer, and voice artist. He is best known for portraying Gerard on Everybody Loves Raymond. He is also the voice of Stanley in the Open Season franchise, Fred the Squirrel in The Penguins of Madagascar, Chuck the Evil Sandwich Making Guy in WordGirl, and Rusty the monkey wrench on Disney Jr.'s Handy Manny. Frederick_"_Fred_"_Stoller ( born March_19_,_1958 ) is an_American_stand-up_comedian , actor , author , writer , and voice_artist . He is_best_known for portraying Gerard on Everybody Loves Raymond . He is also the_voice of Stanley in the_Open_Season_franchise , Fred the_Squirrel in The_Penguins of Madagascar , Chuck the_Evil_Sandwich Making Guy in WordGirl , and Rusty the_monkey_wrench on Disney_Jr. 's_Handy_Manny .
